bug.author: alexggmatthews
bug.summary: Update list of contributors on readme.
bug.description: We need to update the list of contributors in alphabetical order on the readme.

comments.comment: How about just pointing to this: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/GPflow/GPflow/graphs/contributors>https://github.com/GPflow/GPflow/graphs/contributors</denchmark-link> ?
Good suggestion - I'll do both so that the author list appears in text as well.
